## SynQLiteOptionsBase.filePath property

Path to SQLite3 database file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
filePath?: string;
```

## Remarks

If not provided, [SynQLiteOptionsBase.sqlite3](./synqlite-node.synqliteoptionsbase.sqlite3.md) must be set.
